name: PennyFlipper
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flip a penny
des: Tired of flipping quarters, dimes and nickels? Flip a penny instead. Ask Alexa to flip a penny and Penny Flipper will tell you whether you got heads or tails. You can also ask that up to ten pennies be flipped at once. And if flipping pennies is not enough for you, you can also ask for a penny fact. Penny for your thoughts...
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
